title: Meme Knowledge Test
description: How well do you know internet culture? Test your meme literacy!

questions.question: When you see a new meme format, you:

choices.text: Get it after seeing a few examples

questions.question: How often do you browse TikTok or YouTube Shorts?
When a friend sends you a meme:

choices.text: Reply with an even better meme
Ask what it means if confused

questions.question: Do you know what 'OK Boomer' means?

choices.text: Yes, and I've used it ironically
Heard of it but not sure

questions.question: Have you ever participated in an internet challenge?

choices.text: I notice and use it right away
I catch on after a few days
I learn about it much later
A classic, I've done it to others

questions.question: How do you communicate with friends online?

choices.text: Mix of memes and regular chat

questions.question: Do you know what 'based' means in internet slang?

choices.text: I've seen it but not sure

questions.question: Your reaction to seeing 'We live in a society':
How quickly do you catch on to trending audio on social media?

choices.text: After hearing it a few times

questions.question: Do you use internet slang in real life?

choices.text: All the time, ironically or not

results.title: Meme Master
results.description: You're a certified Meme Master! You're always on the cutting edge of internet culture, catching trends before they go mainstream. Your friends probably come to you to explain the latest memes. You speak fluent internet!
results.advice: Your meme knowledge is a superpower! Just remember not everyone speaks internet fluently.

results.title: Meme Enthusiast
results.description: You're a solid Meme Enthusiast! You understand most memes and can navigate internet culture with ease. You might not catch every trend immediately, but you're definitely in the loop. Keep scrolling!
results.advice: You've got a good balance! Keep enjoying memes without making it your whole personality.

results.title: Meme Novice
results.description: You're a Meme Novice - aware of internet culture but still learning the language. You might miss some references or need things explained, but you're curious and willing to learn. Everyone starts somewhere!
results.advice: Spend some time on TikTok or meme pages to naturally pick up the culture!

results.title: Meme Outsider
results.description: You're a Meme Outsider - and that's perfectly fine! Internet culture isn't your thing, and you prefer more traditional forms of communication. You have your own interests and don't feel the need to follow every trend.
results.advice: You don't need to know every meme to live a fulfilling life. Stay true to yourself!
